title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 251 - Withholding of City of Yonkers Income Tax Surcharge
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 251 - Withholding of City of Yonkers Income Tax Surcharge

State Regulations
§ 251.1 - Determining City of Yonkers income tax surcharge to be withheld
§ 251.2 - Employer's returns and payment of City of Yonkers income tax surcharge withheld

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 251

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 671[a][1], 697[a], 1321, 1329, 1332[a];Codes and Ordinances of the City of Yonkers, §§ 15-105, 15-
108[a], 15-111, 92-92[a];L. 2009, ch. 57, part W-1, § 6, part Z-1, § 5; L. 2011, ch. 56, part A, § 11, ch. 255; City of Yonkers Local Law Nos. 3-2011, 9-2011

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
